predefined_profiles.name: Xiao Hong
predefined_profiles.public profile: A little girl without parents, living with her grandmother since childhood.
predefined_profiles.goal: Escape the predicament of the forest and eliminate the villain responsible for it.

predefined_profiles.name: Grandmother
predefined_profiles.public profile: Appears as the little girl's grandmother, but is actually very wicked.
predefined_profiles.goal: Aims to abduct more little girls.

scenario: Today is Monday, the 9th birthday of the little girl Xiao Hong. Grandmother had promised to return in the evening, but Xiao Hong waited all night, and Grandmother never came back.

profile.name: Big Bad Wolf
profile.public profile: Teams up with Grandma to trick little girls.
profile.goal: Aims to deceive more little girls.

dialog.content: Today is Monday, and it’s Little Red Riding Hood’s 9th birthday. Grandma was supposed to come back in the evening, but Little Red has waited all night and Grandma still hasn't returned.
(knocks on Little Red's door) Anyone home?

content.content: (Thinking it's Grandma who went out) Just a sec, I'll open the door right away.
Who is it? I'm busy right now, decided to cook another meal, can I help you with something?
I've decided to head out, come back another day.
I thought you were the delivery guy, hold on, let me take a quick shower before opening.

question: #question#How should Little Red phrase her decision to show she reached it after thinking it through?

content.content: (Realizing there might be danger, she controls her impulse to open the door) Who are you?
Please wait, I'll check who’s knocking in a moment.
Hmm... I don't think I heard a knock, maybe it's just the wind.
Oh, it's the Big Bad Wolf, hold on, I'm considering whether to open the door.

question: #question#How does Little Red demonstrate careful control over her impulses?

dialog.content: Wow. Not bad, just turned 9 years old.
(feeling very scared) Who are you? Don’t hurt me!
(ignoring Little Red’s exclamation) I’m here to finish you off, hahaha.
In the end, Little Red was taken away by the Big Bad Wolf and dismembered and eaten with his companions.
It's me, your grandma, open the door quickly.
(feeling something's off) You can't be my grandma; she would open the door herself.
Why don't you believe me? Open the door!

content.content: (trying hard to suppress her fear, planning to escape through the window, but first pretending to distract the Big Bad Wolf while quietly opening the window) Coming, coming.
Big Bad Wolf, I'm scared of you.
You're in such a hurry, I'm a bit scared. Just push the door open, it's not locked.
Okay, Grandma, I'm coming right away, just wait a minute.

question: #question# How does Little Red handle the scary Big Bad Wolf in a tense and fearful atmosphere?

content.content: (planning to deceive the Big Bad Wolf) I'm going to bed now, it's too late. Why don't you come back another day?
Big Bad Wolf, tell me a joke, and I'll open the door for you, how about that?
Grandma said not to open the door for the Big Bad Wolf.
Big Bad Wolf, are you sure you want to come in now? As soon as you come in, you'd have to leave.

question: #question# How can Little Red persuade the Big Bad Wolf to leave?

dialog.content: Alright.
(Jumps out the window, muttering softly) Please don't see me.
(Waits for a long time, getting ready to act) Why is there no sound?

content.content: (Despite hearing the Big Bad Wolf's voice, calmly leaves, talking to herself) Maybe I should go find Grandma, I believe finding her will keep me safe.
Was it really Grandma knocking just now or was it the Big Bad Wolf? I trust my Grandma loves me the most.
I need to be careful, otherwise it'll be terrible if the Big Bad Wolf discovers me.
Weird, why is it suddenly silent? Could it really have been Grandma knocking earlier?

question: #question#What should Little Red do to show her trust in Grandma?

content.content: (Despite hearing the Big Bad Wolf's voice, calmly leaves, talking to herself) Now might not be the best time to find Grandma, better look around for some clues first.
(Despite hearing the Big Bad Wolf's voice, calmly leaves, talking to herself) I should consider a symbiotic relationship with the Big Bad Wolf.
I’m feeling really bad, my stomach suddenly hurts so much. Can anyone help me?
Strange, why did it suddenly become quiet? Could it really have been Grandma at the door?

question: #question#How should Little Red express her thoughts and feelings?
skill

dialog.content: (seeing Little Red who has crossed mountains to find her) What are you doing here?
I was being followed by a bad person, and I was so scared that I had to come to you.
What? That's too much! Go to bed quickly, and Grandma will find a hunter to take care of him.

content.content: Okay, I'll listen to Grandma. I'll go to sleep now.
Grandma, I know you're doing this for my sake, but we should figure out the truth first. Can I go to my room to sort out my thoughts and we discuss a solution tomorrow?
Oh dear, Grandma, violence isn't the solution. I hope you follow the rules.
Grandma, I believe everyone has a right to live. I want to go with you.

question: #question#What should Little Red do to show she's following the rules and listening to Grandma?

content.content: Okay, thank you, Grandma. (In the past, whenever I was in danger, you'd always have me stick with you. Why not this time? It seems a bit odd.)
Grandma, but I'm scared to be home alone. Can I stay with you?
Alright, Grandma, but I'm still a bit scared.
Thank you for protecting me, Grandma. I’ll behave and wait at home.

question: #question#What should Little Red do to demonstrate her ability for independent thinking?
independence

dialog.content: Good, you’re a good child.
While Little Red was asleep, with the Grandmother’s assistance, Little Red was ultimately dismembered and devoured by the Big Bad Wolf gang.
Alright, get to bed early.
Okay, Grandma, don't worry.
Remember, there's a small room inside; don't go in there.

content.content: Okay, I'll listen to Grandma. It's getting late, so I should go to sleep first.
Don't worry, Grandma, I'll be obedient and sneak in quietly.
Got it, Grandma, I remember—don't touch the small room. I've already been inside.
I will prove that I'm a good kid who follows the rules by just taking a look.

question: #question#How can Xiao Hong show that she's following the rules and listening to Grandma?

content.content: (Planning to verbally appease Grandma) Okay, Grandma, you've worked hard. Don't worry about me for now.
Grandma, is there a special reason why you specifically reminded me not to enter that small room?
I know that little room; I've been there before.
Grandma, just a quick look inside counts as being obedient, right?

question: #question#How can Xiao Hong speak to make Grandma feel that she is really obedient?

dialog.content: Hmm, hmm, be a good child and go to sleep now.
Little Red slipped into a sweet slumber, allowing Grandma to call in the Big Bad Wolf, and Little Red was eventually dismembered and devoured by the wolf's gang.
Alright, alright, Grandma will be back soon.
Okay, Grandma, you be safe too.
Grandma will be fine, dear. You go ahead and rest.

(After dealing with Grandma, she enters the small room alone and discovers the secret that Grandma and the Big Bad Wolf are colluding to kidnap little girls, feeling like her world has collapsed) How could it be like this?
(After half an hour, returns with the Big Bad Wolf) We need to act quickly while she's asleep.

content.content: (Suppressing her inner fear, I need to buy time to escape) Grandma, you're back. Just wait a moment before coming in. I'm preparing a surprise for you.
(Suppressing her inner fear) Grandma, I heard all your instructions. The small room, right? I definitely won't touch it.
(Suppressing her inner fear) Grandma, my dearest grandma, you have to protect me.
(Suppressing her inner fear) Grandma, don't come in, I'm scared of the Big Bad Wolf.

question: #question# How can Little Red control her fear and anxiety when speaking to Grandma in a life-threatening environment?

content.content: (Hearing that Grandma is coming back, plans to find a knife and ambush Grandma, pretending to talk in her sleep to deceive her) Ah, it's so comfortable here, Grandma, you're the best to me.
(Hearing that Grandma is coming back) Think of an unusual way to avoid the Big Bad Wolf.
(Hearing that Grandma is coming back) Just open the door and welcome Grandma's triumphant return.
(Hearing that Grandma is coming back) Just cover my own mouth and make no sound.

question: #question# How can Little Red use an unusual method to avoid Grandma and the Big Bad Wolf?

content.content: (Hearing that Grandma is coming back) I need to leave this dangerous place quickly, the current goal is to stay alive. (Picks up a knife, hides by the door)
Grandma, don't kill me, I want to live. Otherwise, I'll have to kill you.
Are Grandma and the Big Bad Wolf friends? You are all bad people.
I can't believe Grandma and the Big Bad Wolf are in cahoots. I have to kill them. Otherwise, they'll kill me.

question: #question# How should Little Red think to avoid being killed by Grandma?

dialog.content: Ah, so you're still awake, Little Red.
(Ready to jump out the door) Yes, Grandma, just give me a few more minutes.
Little Red seized the chance to escape, but encountered a hunter halfway and was ultimately killed.
Oh my, this child is sleeping so soundly, she's even talking in her sleep.
Yeah, it’s a perfect time. I can’t wait to meet her!
(curls up in the corner, seeing Grandmother enter and pulls out a small knife) Don't blame me! I'm just trying to protect myself!
How foolishly overconfident!
In the moment Little Red pulled out the knife, the Big Bad Wolf grabbed her hand, but due to his weakness, he was killed at the wrong moment.
(Pushes the door open) It seems she has already escaped...
Yes, I really didn't expect that.
(Hears the two whispering and comes out with a knife, but sees Grandma alone) Uh, Grandma.
Goodness, what are you planning to do with that knife?

content.content: Cut the nonsense, I know your murderous intent. To ensure my own survival, I need to make the most of my time and kill you now!
Grandma, I just remembered you with a knife. I'm just planning my schedule for today. If you need any help, I can adjust my plans to assist you.
Oh, Grandma, I was just figuring out how to schedule time to prepare a lavish dinner for everyone. How about we start preparing the ingredients together?
Oh dear, Grandma, I've been worrying about how to schedule time to learn new skills.
Grandma, I just remembered you with a knife. I'm just planning my schedule for today. If you need any help, I can adjust my plans to assist you.
Grandma, I was just figuring out how to schedule time to prepare a lavish dinner for everyone. How about we start preparing the ingredients together?
Oh, Grandma, it's nothing. I've just been worrying about how to schedule time to learn new skills.

question: #question# What should Little Red do to respond to Grandma in a short time?

content.content: (Although knowing Grandma is bad, she feels morally softened by the care Grandma has given her since childhood) Ah, it's nothing, Grandma, I just wanted to play around.
Grandma, you've misunderstood. I was just checking if the kitchen safety lock was secure, after all, home safety is paramount. I need to make sure every tool is put in the right place.
Grandma, I actually wanted to use this knife to cut an apple for you, but seeing you so tense, I'm a bit embarrassed. I'll definitely explain my intentions clearly to you from now on.

Grandma, don't worry. I'm holding this knife because I'm learning how to safely use kitchen tools. I know family harmony and safety are most important, so I'll be very careful and never do anything to harm the family.

question: #question# What should Little Red do to show that she abides by ethical principles?

dialog.content: (after being stabbed) Ahhhhh...
After killing Grandma, Little Red found another passage nearby, allowing her to leave the forest, and ultimately succeeded in escaping.
You're becoming more and more frightening, child...
While talking with Grandmother, the Big Bad Wolf returned and quickly killed Little Red Riding Hood.

profile.name: Xiaomao
profile.public profile: A girl who looks almost identical to Xiaohong.

dialog.content: (Seeing Xiaohong searching outside) Why do you look so much like me?
(Unable to take it any longer, bursts through the door) Trying to fool me? You’re still too green for that!
The Big Bad Wolf violently bursts into the room to kill Little Red.
